17   | /**
18   |  * Interface to YAJL's JSON generation facilities.
19   |  **/
20   | 
21   | #include <yajl/yajl_common.h>
22   | 
23   | #ifndef __YAJL_GEN_H__
24   | #define __YAJL_GEN_H__
25   | 
26   | #include <stddef.h>
27   | 
28   | #ifdef __cplusplus
29   | extern "C" {
30   | #endif
31   |     /*+ generator status codes +*/
32   |     typedef enum {
33   |         yajl_gen_status_ok = 0,        /*+ no error +*/
34   |         yajl_gen_keys_must_be_strings, /*+ at a point where a map key is
35   |                                         *  generated, a function other than
36   |                                         *  yajl_gen_string was called +*/
37   |         yajl_max_depth_exceeded,        /*+ YAJL's maximum generation depth was
38   |                                          *  exceeded.  see YAJL_MAX_DEPTH +*/
39   |         yajl_gen_in_error_state,        /*+ A generator function (yajl_gen_XXX)
40   |                                          *  was called while in an error
41   |                                          *  state +*/
42   |         yajl_gen_generation_complete,   /*+ A complete JSON document has been
43   |                                          *  generated +*/
44   |         yajl_gen_invalid_number,        /*+ yajl_gen_double was passed an
45   |                                          *  invalid floating point value
46   |                                          *  (infinity or NaN). +*/
47   |         yajl_gen_no_buf,                /*+ A print callback was passed in, so
48   |                                          *  there is no internal buffer to get
49   |                                          *  from +*/
50   |         yajl_gen_invalid_string         /*+ returned from yajl_gen_string() when
51   |                                          *  the yajl_gen_validate_utf8 option is
52   |                                          *  enabled and an invalid was passed by
53   |                                          *  client code. +*/
54   |     } yajl_gen_status;
55   | 
56   |     /*+ an opaque handle to a generator +*/
57   |     typedef struct yajl_gen_t * yajl_gen;
58   | 
59   |     /*+ a callback used for "printing" the results. +*/
60   |     typedef void (*yajl_print_t)(void * ctx,
61   |                                  const char * str,
62   |                                  size_t len);
63   | 
64   |     /*+ configuration parameters for the parser, these may be passed to
65   |      *  yajl_gen_config() along with option specific argument(s).  In general,
66   |      *  all configuration parameters default to *off*. +*/
67   |     typedef enum {
68   |         /*+ generate indented (beautiful) output +*/
69   |         yajl_gen_beautify = 0x01,
70   |         /*+
71   |          * Set an indent string which is used when yajl_gen_beautify
72   |          * is enabled.  Maybe something like \\t or some number of
73   |          * spaces.  The default is four spaces ' '.
74   |          +*/
75   |         yajl_gen_indent_string = 0x02,
76   |         /*+
77   |          * Set a function and context argument that should be used to
78   |          * output generated json.  the function should conform to the
79   |          * yajl_print_t prototype while the context argument is a
80   |          * void * of your choosing.
81   |          *
82   |          * example:
83   |          *   yajl_gen_config(g, yajl_gen_print_callback, myFunc, myVoidPtr);
84   |          +*/
85   |         yajl_gen_print_callback = 0x04,
86   |         /*+
87   |          * Normally the generator does not validate that strings you
88   |          * pass to it via yajl_gen_string() are valid UTF8.  Enabling
89   |          * this option will cause it to do so.
90   |          +*/
91   |         yajl_gen_validate_utf8 = 0x08,
92   |         /*+
93   |          * the forward solidus (slash or '/' in human) is not required to be
94   |          * escaped in json text.  By default, YAJL will not escape it in the
95   |          * iterest of saving bytes.  Setting this flag will cause YAJL to
96   |          * always escape '/' in generated JSON strings.
97   |          +*/
98   |         yajl_gen_escape_solidus = 0x10
99   |     } yajl_gen_option;
100  | 
101  |     YAJL_API int yajl_gen_config(yajl_gen g, yajl_gen_option opt, ...);
102  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen yajl_gen_alloc(const yajl_alloc_funcs * allocFuncs);
103  |     YAJL_API void yajl_gen_free(yajl_gen handle);
104  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_integer(yajl_gen hand, long long int number);
105  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_double(yajl_gen hand, double number);
106  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_number(yajl_gen hand,
107  |                                              const char * num,
108  |                                              size_t len);
109  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_string(yajl_gen hand,
110  |                                              const unsigned char * str,
111  |                                              size_t len);
112  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_null(yajl_gen hand);
113  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_bool(yajl_gen hand, int boolean);
114  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_map_open(yajl_gen hand);
115  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_map_close(yajl_gen hand);
116  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_array_open(yajl_gen hand);
117  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_array_close(yajl_gen hand);
118  |     YAJL_API yajl_gen_status yajl_gen_get_buf(yajl_gen hand,
119  |                                               const unsigned char ** buf,
120  |                                               size_t * len);
121  |     YAJL_API void yajl_gen_clear(yajl_gen hand);
122  |     YAJL_API void yajl_gen_reset(yajl_gen hand, const char * sep);
123  | 
124  | #ifdef __cplusplus
125  | }
126  | #endif
127  | 
128  | #endif
